title: Being accused of something I did not post
text:
I was recently suspended for supposedly posting a picture of Donald Trump nude, which I did not post and I was suspended for a number of days

I do not know how this happened, but I can assure you I did not post this picture somehow someone else posted it on my account

I try not to post anything political let alone something like that

I am hoping that this does not happen again. I enjoy Facebook very much, but I was very taken back by that happening to me.
